promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a dynamic special dragon steel-type pokemon wearing a metallic mask. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Maskouro, a a dynamic special dragon steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Time Freeze. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "steel" or "Maskouro". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, dragon-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Maskouro, the Time-Shift Serpent; often seen shimmering in arid landscapes, it uses its mystic ability to pause time, refining its metallic scales.
